CloudGear (cloudgear.net) | Software/System Engineer | REMOTE

We are looking for a Ruby/Rails developer (60 - 100%) with an interest in Docker and Kubernetes. Technologies used are Rails, PostgreSQL, Redis, Go, Docker, Kubernetes, etcd. You should be an experienced Ruby/Rails programmer with a strong interest in PaaS, DevOps and infrastructure automation. We are working on a product and have interesting challenges ahead. You will work together with the founder: starting with stories, to architecture and the final implementation and with a high impact on the product, too.

Location: remote, but Europe is preferred. Please let me know if you're interested in working with us: georg (at) cloudgear.net - https://www.cloudgear.net
